About Austin libraries Coffee shops

Coffee shops

In February 2016, after coming back from a trip to Portland where I visited a couple new coffee shops, I decided to try an experiment back in Austin: visit a new coffee shop that I’ve never been to before, every day for a month. This page was updated with my progress, potential new places to try, and all my microblog posts for each visit are under the tag #newcoffee.

Here are all the places I’ve visited, with date links to each blog post:

  • Sorrento’s drive-thru — Feb 18
  • Summer Moon — Feb 19
  • BarleyBean — Feb 20
  • Lola Savannah Coffee Lounge — Feb 21
  • Star Coffee Texas — Feb 22
  • Pacha — Feb 23
  • Dazzle Coffee — Feb 24
  • Cups & Cones — Feb 25
  • San Francisco Bakery — Feb 26
  • Lamppost Coffee — Feb 27
  • Angel Donuts & Treats — Feb 28
  • Seventh Flag — Feb 29
  • Wright Bros. Brew & Brew — Mar 1
  • Joel’s Coffee — Mar 2
  • Figure 8 Coffee Purveyors — Mar 3
  • Stinson’s Bistro — Mar 4
  • Cherrywood Coffeehouse — Mar 5
  • Elixer Coffee — Mar 6
  • Kick Butt Coffee — Mar 7
  • Fat Cats: Organic Coffee & Desserts — Mar 8
  • Spider House — Mar 9
  • Sips Coffee & More — Mar 10
  • Patika — Mar 11
  • Beware Coffee — Mar 12
  • Juiceland — Mar 13
  • Vintage Heart — Mar 14
  • Alta’s Cafe — Mar 15
  • Departure Lounge — Mar 15
  • Cianfrani Coffeehouse — Mar 16
  • Sage Cafe — Mar 17
  • Once Over Coffee Bar — Mar 18
